sentences.en: "This ain't no affair of yours, boy!" McClosky said threateningly.
sentences.cn: “小子，这不关你的事！”麦克洛斯基威胁道。

sentences.en: Are you interested in world affairs?
sentences.cn: 你对世界大事感兴趣吗？

sentences.en: Economically and politically, this affair couldn't come at a worse time.
sentences.cn: 无论从经济上还是政治上来看，这件事来得都太不是时候了。

sentences.en: He claims he was made the fall guy for the affair.
sentences.cn: 他声称自己是这起事件的替罪羊。

sentences.en: He had an affair with his boss that lasted six years.
sentences.cn: 他和老板的暧昧关系持续了六年。

sentences.en: He will now face a disciplinary hearing for having an affair.
sentences.cn: 他因有外遇而要面临纪律听证会的裁决。

sentences.en: In a strange way, his affair caused our relationship to strengthen.
sentences.cn: 奇怪的是，他的婚外恋倒使我们之间的关系更加紧密了。

sentences.en: Jean was thoroughly cheesed off by the whole affair.
sentences.cn: 琼对整件事情彻底绝望了。

sentences.en: Married male supervisors were carrying on affairs with female subordinates in the office.
sentences.cn: 已婚男上司和办公室里的女下级在搞不正当关系。

sentences.en: Okay so have an affair, but not right under my nose.
sentences.cn: 有外遇就有外遇好了，但别在我眼皮底下。

sentences.en: She was having an affair with someone at work.
sentences.cn: 她跟某一同事有染。

sentences.en: The dinner was often a riotous affair enlivened by superbly witty speeches.
sentences.cn: 宴会常常会因为一些非常诙谐的讲话而气氛活跃，热闹非凡。

sentences.en: The industry minister described the affair as "an absolute scandal".
sentences.cn: 工业部长将此事件形容为“绝对的丑闻”。

sentences.en: The media, meanwhile, has blown hot and cold on the affair.
sentences.cn: 同时，媒体对这件事的态度表现得忽冷忽热。

sentences.en: The Ministry desperately tried to hush up the whole affair.
sentences.cn: 部里拼命想隐瞒整个事件。

sentences.en: the Ministry of Foreign Affairs
sentences.cn: 外交部

sentences.en: The newspapers exaggerated the whole affair wildly.
sentences.cn: 报章毫无根据地夸大了整个事件。

sentences.en: The stages in her love affair with Harry are perceptively written.
sentences.cn: 她和哈里恋爱的各阶段写得非常细腻深刻。

sentences.en: the Watergate affair
sentences.cn: 水门事件

sentences.en: Their 4-1 win in Honduras was a particularly lively affair.
sentences.cn: 他们在洪都拉斯以4比1获胜的那场比赛尤其激动人心。

sentences.en: We all knew by then that the affair was practically over.
sentences.cn: 到那时，我们都知道事情实际上已经结束了。

sentences.en: Women had little role in public affairs.
sentences.cn: 女性过去几乎不参与公共事务。

trans.tran_cn: 事务，私事，事件，东西，风流韵事
trans.tran_en: public or political events and activities
